p: Neutral and polar lipids from Chinese star anise whole seedpod oil (CSAO) were analyzed by performing thin-layer chromatography (TLC) using aluminum sheets coated with 0.2 mm silica gel 60. For neutral and polar lipids analysis, chromatographic solvents containing diethylether: acetic acid (55:45:1) and chloroform:methanol:water (65:35:5) [ 33] were used, respectively. Iodine vapor was applied for developing TLC Plates.
